name: Volvo Car Corporation AB
membership: Volvo Car Corporation is a member of ACEA, EUCAR, FEBIAC as well as of the Confederation of Swedish Enterprises and AGORIA.
goal: The Volvo Cars European Affairs Office in Brussels monitors EU policies and legislation relevant to Volvo Car Corporation activities. It cooperates with EU institutions and other associations, providing technical expertise. It represents Volvo Car Corporation in European associations and vis-à-vis other stakeholders in Brussels.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade issues - Brexit, EU-US, EU-China; battery initiative; ITS - Connectivity and Data Protection; automation; safety; mobility as a service
